rooms.name: South of the Cyan House
rooms.description: You find yourself south of a Cyan House, weathered by constant winds.

rooms.name: East of the Cyan House
rooms.description: You are east of the Cyan House.

rooms.name: North of the Cyan House
rooms.description: You are north of the Cyan House. A loose window sits on the wall. To the north, vast plains spread to the horizon.

rooms.name: West Room
rooms.description: You climb through the open window, entering the west room of the Cyan House. It seems to have been looted long ago. A doorframe, but no door, is to the east.

rooms.name: East Room
rooms.description: You enter the east room of the Cyan House. In the room sits a magnificent table adorned with a bottle of water, some bandages, and an ancient tome.

rooms.name: West of the Cyan House
rooms.description: You are west of the Cyan House. A cobbled trail leads further to the west, towards an abandoned city plaza.

rooms.name: Town Plaza
rooms.description: You find an abandoned city plaza. A broken-down fountain sits to the north, and a small clearing is to the south.

rooms.name: Tarnished Fountain
rooms.description: You marvel at a broken-down fountain, with worthless, scattered coins upon it. You see a shabby-looking bridge further north.

rooms.name: Plaza Outskirts
rooms.description: You stand at the edges of the isloated town plaza. Before your feet run the rushing River of Souls.

rooms.name: Bridge of Lost Souls
rooms.description: You stand upon the Bridge of Lost Souls. You feel your soul trying to wrench itself from your body.

rooms.name: Castle Grounds
rooms.description: You stand upon the castle crossroads, gazing around the imperial courtyard. A refurbished bridge is to the west, an alabaster gate is to the south, and the castle steps sit north. You spot an overgrown path to the east.

rooms.name: Overgrown Path
rooms.description: You follow the winding path along the boreal forest. The path continues from the south to the northeast, but you stop at a weathered sign. 'WELCOME to YUKON TERRITORY'

rooms.name: Castle of Alaskan Cheese
rooms.description: Climbing up the steps, you stand before the tall, bronze castle doors. They're unlocked, but you soul beckons for you to keep quiet.

rooms.name: Frostbitten Tundra
rooms.description: You stand alone in an icy tundra, when snowflakes start falling around you. The path continues from the northwest to the east, where you can see the faint glow of a log cabin.

rooms.name: Snowy Cabin
rooms.description: You stand at the door to the log cabin, blanketed by recent snowfall. The sign above the door reads: 'Best Furs in ALL OF CANADA'.

rooms.name: Fur Store
rooms.description: You enter the cabin. Instantly, the warmth rejuvenates your soul.

rooms.name: Border Gate
rooms.description: You stand between the thick pearled gates leading to the Castle. There is a small patrol booth, but it seems to be deserted. You can see a lake to the south.

rooms.name: Clock Lake Lookout
rooms.description: You stand on the shoreline of an enormous lake. An oaken dock, to the southeast, extends further upon the water.

rooms.name: Clock Dock
rooms.description: You swing your sullied boots off the edge of the pier. A harmonious feeling washes over you.

rooms.name: Gates of Hell
rooms.description: You stand before the gnarled, towering gates, with dread imbued within your soul. Inexplicably, the wooden door to the underground tunnel seems to be locked with an arcane incantation.

rooms.name: Door Sanctuary
rooms.description: You stand upon a crossroads of doors, in every cardinal direction. One catches your eye, to the north.

rooms.name: Mystery Door of Mystery
rooms.description: You peer at the worn-down door with a sense of terror. Several unearthly-coloured jewels emblazon its edges. It is unlocked, but you feel you will perish from its hands.

rooms.name: Lower Hall of Enemies
rooms.description: You stand before a battered room; it is scattered with skulls of presumptuous warriors from days of yore.

rooms.name: Upper Hall of Enemies
rooms.description: The upper hall seems vastly different. The floors and walls are a pristine, tiled white, with no corpses in sight.

rooms.name: Alaskan Castle Foyer
rooms.description: You stand in the centre of a large foyer, decorated in an ornate Victorian-Alaskan aesthetic. A large staircase leads to the ruling family's private quarters.

rooms.name: Upper Atrium
rooms.description: Standing far above the foyer, you feel lightheaded. You can hear faint snoring, but you can't tell if it comes from the east or the west.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: You enter the master bedroom of the Princess of Alaskan Cheese. She's engrossed within a deep sleep in an expensive, marble four-poster bed. Her face reminds you of Ms. Dybala. A leather-bound notebook sits on her bedside table, with one page bookmarked.

rooms.name: Cheese Vault
rooms.description: You enter the prestigous cheese vault, containing many precious Alaskan Cheeses. Unfortunately, they have all been locked within a safe.

rooms.name: Hallway
rooms.description: You are in a long hallway. There are family pictures on all of the walls.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: You are in a blue bathroom

rooms.name: South of Crater
rooms.description: You are south of a large, bottomless crater. Looking down into the black abyss fills you with terror.

rooms.name: West of Crater
rooms.description: You are west of a large crater. In the distance, a gloomy fog enshrouds the land further westward.

rooms.name: Shrouded Grave
rooms.description: You are surrounded by a dark, misty fog. In front of you is a gravestone that reads: 'Scell E. Ton'.

rooms.name: The Lair
rooms.description: You are in a huge cave.

rooms.name: North of Crater
rooms.description: You are standing north of the crater, in front of a large cavern. A terrifying, animalistic roar emanates from within.

rooms.name: East of Crater
rooms.description: You stand within the boundaries of the caverous and forested lands. To your west is a large cavern. To your east is the endless forest.

rooms.name: Mysterious Entrance
rooms.description: A boarded-up tunnel blocks the way before you. It seems to lead further westward, towards the base of the Table Caldera.

rooms.name: Forest Tripoint
rooms.description: You are standing in a forest filled with tall pines. The thick overhead canopy blocks almost all sunlight through. A thick mist blankets the forest floor. You hear a wolf howl in the distance.

rooms.name: Small Clearing
rooms.description: The forest opens up into a small clearing. Sunlight streams through the opening in the canopy onto the ground. Flowers bloom in the meadow and you catch a glimpse of a bunny hopping behind a rock.

rooms.name: Campsite Lookout
rooms.description: The forest opens up into a small clearing. You see a sign that says 'Welcome to Tableland'

rooms.name: Great Cliff Lookout
rooms.description: You peer over the edges of an enormous cliff. You can almost see every nook and cranny of the land. Across the River of Souls, you see a huge ornate castle, a temple, and snow-covered lands. You are awestruck by the natural beauty of Tableland. You take a deep breath and bask in the beauty of what you are seeing. You stand there for a moment, and suddenly remember that you have a mission to fulfill.

rooms.name: Base of Mt. Tableland
rooms.description: You standing at the base of the towering Mount Tabeland, the tallest mountain in the region. A historical building sits to its east, clearly inspired by Victorian architecture.

rooms.name: Parliament Steps
rooms.description: You are standing on the steps of the Parliament of Tableland. It reminds you of the Ottawa Parliament Buildings, but you cannot remember what Ottawa is.

rooms.name: Bridge of Found Souls
rooms.description: You stand on a bridge over a rushing, powerful river. Glimpses of vibrant-coloured fish peek through the brooks. To the east, you can see a beautiful castle.

rooms.name: Mysterious Entrance
rooms.description: In front of you is a boarded up tunnel. Carved into a base of a mountain

rooms.name: Forest Tripoint
rooms.description: You are standing in a forest of tall trees. The forest canopy is so thick, almost all sunlight is blocked out. A thick fog blankets the forest floor. You hear a wolf howl in the distance.

rooms.name: Small Clearing
rooms.description: The forest opens up into a small clearing. Sunlight streams through the opening in the canopy onto the ground. Flowers bloom in the meadow and you catch a glimpse of a bunny hopping behind a rock.

rooms.name: Campsite Lookout
rooms.description: The forest opens up into a small clearing. You see a sign that says "Welcome to Tableland Campsite"

rooms.name: Great Cliff Lookout
rooms.description: You are standing over a huge cliff. In the distance you can see a huge ornate castle and a large forest. You are awestruck by the natural beauty of Tableland. You take a deep breath and appreciate the beauty of what you are seeing. You stand for a moment. Then you remember that you have a mission and you have to continue.

rooms.name: Base of Mt. Tableland
rooms.description: You are standing at the base of a large ominous mountain.

rooms.name: Parliament Steps
rooms.description: You are standing on the steps of Tableland. A building similar to the Ottawa Parliament Buildings stand in front of you.

rooms.name: Parliament Entrance Room
rooms.description: Description

rooms.name: Bridge of Found Souls
rooms.description: You stand on a bridge over a clear blue river. You can see fish swimming through the river. In the distance you can see a beautiful castle.

rooms.name: Crossroads of Destiny
rooms.description: You stand at crossroads. Far in the North, the Castle of Alaskan Cheese looms. To the West the Temple of News News.

rooms.name: Temple Pavillion
rooms.description: You stand a huge ornate temple. It looks like Hercule's house.

rooms.name: News News Temple Room
rooms.description: You stand in a huge entryway. Books are piled on the shelves and sunlight streams through the skylight. A door is directly across from you on the other side of the room.

rooms.name: News News Vault
rooms.description: You stand in a huge beautiful vault. Gold coins litter the floor. On the other side of the room, in a glass case is a scroll.

rooms.name: Tableland Plains
rooms.description: You are in the plains of Tableland. The Cyan House is to the South, and the Temple of News News is to the Northeast.

rooms.name: Shadowed Plains
rooms.description: You stand in a gloomy field. You see a huge cloud above you. You feel compelled to go there.

exits.adjacentRoom: Entrance to Temple of the Sky Gods
